dmca.title: ABUSE] Re: WTFLOOPS.COM content, LETSGETAPARTYGOING.COM content, THECOWBELL.COM conte
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, May 13, 2005 3:18 PM
To: legal@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Re: WTFLOOPS.COM content, LETSGETAPARTYGOING.COM
content, THECOWBELL.COM content, MIDGETRAVE.COM content, THEMILKSHAKE.COM
content, HITITREGAN.COM content, TREEHUMP.COM content.]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Forwarding to Legal for review.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Re: WTFLOOPS.COM content, LETSGETAPARTYGOING.COM content,
THECOWBELL.COM content, MIDGETRAVE.COM content, THEMILKSHAKE.COM content,
HITITREGAN.COM content, TREEHUMP.COM content.
Date: Fri, 13 May 2005 11:44:54 -0700
From: dickcream <mega@dickcream.com>
To: ohwack@gmail.com, tenthblind@yahoo.com, info@wtfloops.com,
alex@nodushosting.com, tosinoff@yahoo.com, yacking@aol.com
CC: josh@hostedbyhex.com, abuse@theplanet.com

Dear Domain Hostmaster,

Please be advised that we represent DC Productions Inc. and this letter is
sent demanding that you cease and desist your use of the content available
on domain names WTFLOOPS.COM, LETSGETAPARTYGOING.COM, THECOWBELL.COM,
MIDGETRAVE.COM, THEMILKSHAKE.COM, HITITREGAN.COM and TREEHUMP.COM.
It has come to our attention that, without the knowledge or consent of DC
Productions Inc, that you have obtained the domain names in question and are
using it to operate a commercial website using content stolen from DC
Productions Inc's website; www.dickcream.com. Although you are not using the
phrase "Dickcream", your website undoubtedly gives the mistaken impression
that the website was operated by our client and/or is confusing and
misleading in that some persons wou Your conduct infringes our client's
rights in numerous ways, including but not limited to the following:
1. It constitutes false association and false designation of origin in
violation of 15 U.S.C. 1125(a); 2. It violates the Anti Cyberprivacy
Computer Act under 15 U.S.C. 1129.
The above is not intended to be a complete recitation of our client's
rights, and we reserve the right to assert other or further claims in
connection with your actions.
We demand that you do each of the following in these circumstances:
a. Immediately cease and desist your use of the aforementioned domains and
allDC Productions Inc copyrighted content on the said domain names in
connection with your website; b. Agree, in writing, that you will not engage
in no further commercial use of the content from dickcream.com c. Agree to
assign to our client the LETSGETAPARTYGOING.COM, THECOWBELL.COM,
MIDGETRAVE.COM, THEMILKSHAKE.COM, HITITREGAN.COM and TREEHUMP.COM domain
names.
Please be advised that if you do not agree and actually do all of the above
described matters within no later than 14 days of the date of this letter,
we will pursue all remedies available. Nothing herein should be deemed a
waiver of any of our client? rights or remedies. Please contact our office
as we await your immediate cooperation.

Very truly yours,
Nathaniel Livingston III



- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.1 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFChQtzvK/XpJs6oyURAnIcAJ9QgNH1lKXO62DsyhZ9iZvtBYD8PQCZAVbL
9tdRSh/taIVP42oxwNO/ETo=
=tYQR
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
